hiraNyEShTaqkA u#paqdadhA#tIq-mAnEqvaitABi#-rlOqkA-~jjyOti#ShmataH kuruqtE&thO# EqtABi#rEqvAsmA# iqmE lOqkAH pra BA$ntiq yAstE# agnEq sUryEq ruca# udyaqtO diva#mAtaqnvanti# raqSmiBi#H | 
tABiqH sarvA#BI ruqcE janA#ya naskRudhi ||
yA vO# dEvAqH sUryEq rucOq gOShvaSvE#Shuq yA ruca#H | 
indrA$gnIq tABiqH sarvA#BIq ruca#M nO dhatta bRuhaspatE || 
ruca#nnO dhEhi - [  ] 26
